price: 28. Koodii u wanaagsanaa baa yidhi: Miyaana idinku odhan: (Alle) xurmo weyneeya oo hufa?
arabic: قَالَ أَوۡسَطُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ لَوۡلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla awsaṭuhum alam aqul lakum lawlā tusabbiḥūna
